glsa.title: libpng: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in libpng, the worst of which could lead to execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: libpng is the official PNG reference library used to read, write and manipulate PNG images.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in libpng. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All libpng users should upgrade to the latest version:
